login.title: Login
login.account_does_not_exist: That account does not exist. Did you type the email wrong?
login.invalid_request: Email address is invalid, or password is too short.
login.wrong_method: This account might not have been registered this way. Try other login options.
login.internal_error: This error is not your fault! The server misbehaved.
login.internet_error: Your Internet connection might have gone out.

register.title: Register
register.name: Name
register.accept_privacy_required: You must accept the privacy policy to register.
register.invalid_request: Email address is invalid, or password is too short.
register.conflict: That email address is already registered.
register.internal_error: This error is not your fault! The server misbehaved.
register.internet_error: Your Internet connection might have gone out.

forgot.title: Reset password
forgot.sent: If an account exists, we've sent an email with reset instructions.
forgot.invalid_request: Please enter a valid email address.
forgot.internal_error: This error is not your fault! The server misbehaved.
forgot.internet_error: Your Internet connection might have gone out.

categories.title: Manage Categories
categories.delete_description: Are you sure you want to delete the following category "{name}" (ID {id})?
categories.error_invalid_name: Category name is too long or too short.

acknowledgements.title: Acknowledgements

403.title: 403 Forbidden
403.description: You are logged in, but you are not authorized to view this page.

404.title: 404 Not Found
404.description: The page you requested does not exist.
